definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To beat severely ; to thrash .
( transitive ) To beat or overcome thoroughly , to defeat heavily ; especially ( games , sports ) to win against (someone) by a wide margin .
examples: The Mexican team trounced the Americans by 10 goals to 1.

definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To chastise or punish physically or verbally ; to scold with abusive language .
( transitive , British , regional ) To punish by bringing a lawsuit against; to sue .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To beat severely ; to thrash .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To beat or overcome thoroughly , to defeat heavily ; especially ( games , sports ) to win against (someone) by a wide margin .
( transitive ) To chastise or punish physically or verbally ; to scold with abusive language .
( transitive , British , regional ) To punish by bringing a lawsuit against; to sue .

definitions.definition: To walk heavily or with some difficulty ; to tramp , to trudge .
To pass across or over; to traverse .
To travel quickly over a long distance .

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To walk heavily or with some difficulty ; to tramp , to trudge .
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To pass across or over; to traverse .
( intransitive ) To travel quickly over a long distance .
